name: Neo4j Browser
tagline: Search the graph, one query at a time
body:
Neo4j Browser (Stealth Release)
==================

Neo4j Browser is a stealth project to update Neo4j's built-in client application. *Please* do not share links to this project or discuss it in any public forums. 

Goals:

* developer focused
* every interaction is a demonstration
* use only public APIs
* for modern browsers, with reasonable fallbacks

## Download

Two stealth projects in one, Neo4j Browser bundled into Neo4j Desktop (a single jar build of Neo4j):

* [Neo4j Browser + Desktop 2.0-SNAPSHOT](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/341231/Neo4j%20Browser/neo4j-desktop-2.0-SNAPSHOT.jar)

# Feedback

* [Andreas Kollegger](mailto:andreas@neotechnology.com) - for direct correspondence
* [github issues](https://github.com/neo4j/neo4j-browser/issues?milestone=2&state=open) for bug reports (not feature requests)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
